#1.1 No Inappropriate content
- No harassing other members or NSFW (18+) content.

#1.2 No advertising
- Discord servers and other types of advertisement is totally forbidden.
- If you are invited by someone who you do not know, report it to staff immediately.

#1.3 Appeals and issues
- Do not discuss staff actions in the channels or share staff's DMs.
- Contact the server Administrator(s) if you have any issues with the moderation team/system.
- Obey the staffs' orders.

#1.4 No public drama
- Solve any issues in private or DM a moderator.
- Any inappropriate DMs from users should be reported to staff.
- Sensitive topics includes politics, dramas, other server dramas etc.
- Please do not go far or sensitive with the topic. We do not recommend discussing deep topics here.

#1.5 Be respectful to each other
- Do not say things with the intention of hurting anyone in the server.
- If someone tells you to stop then stop and do not go on with the subject.
- This includes but is not limited to hate speech and triggering remarks.
- Respect and accept other's problems and issues.

#1.6 Privacy Policy
- Be aware that what you post can be viewed by anyone, as this is a public URL. We do not recommend you to share private informations here.
- Sharing private information is on your hand, we will not be responsible for it.

#2.1 Server Filter is under PG 13+
- Meaning swears are allowed as long you do not cross the border and if it's used to insult others.
- Slurs are strictly forbidden
- 13+ contents are okay but please remember there are many minors here so, please make sure to censor sensitive topics which includes memes as well.

#2.2 Venting
- Get your "peer-support" role from role channel or contact a staff to give you the role. The role unlocks the peer-support channels.
- We do not recommend you to discuss sensitive topics in public chats. If you are told to move the topic in peer-supports, please obey it.
- Must censor sensitive/triggering lines, words and incidents while venting.

#2.3 Server Information
- This server is a Psychology and Education based server.
We do not provide professional service/help here. Only occasionally we announce "Ask a therapist/psychiatrist" for our Youtube channel which is random.
- Please only use English on this server.
- Please do not use blank names. "789" is okay but "   " is not. "." should also be changed.
- Do not abuse the staff ping, please use help-desk. Ping the mods only in case of emergency reasons.
- Server F.A.Q are in about-n-faq. Make sure to check it out.
- No Alternative Accounts

#2.4 Server strike system
- Server strike system is not specific, it depends on the situation and condition.
